## AsyncSeriesBailHook class

Asynchronous Series Bail Hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AsyncSeriesBailHook<T, R> extends AsyncTapHook<T, R> 
```

## Remarks

Invoke listeners in queue asynchronously. Calling will bail with non-undefined value returned with listener. If no listener return non-undefined value, calling will bail with first element of arguments

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [callAsync(args)](./hamon.asyncseriesbailhook.callasync.md) |  | call listener with <code>...args</code> and <code>cb</code> |
|  [callPromise(args)](./hamon.asyncseriesbailhook.callpromise.md) |  | \* call listener with <code>...args</code> |
